name: Polyzen
css: /* i really want this to be global */body,html{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#232323!important;font:400 14px arial,sans-serif;margin:0}.button,input{background:#9c9595!important;color:#000!important;border:1px solid rgba(185,185,185,1);-webkit-border-radius:23px;-moz-border-radius:23px;border-radius:23px;display:inline-block}a:link,body_alink{color:#000!important;text-decoration:none}a:visited,body_avisited{color:#444542!important;text-decoration:none}a:active,a:hover,body_ahover{color:#444542!important;text-decoration:underline}.page{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#1b2c18!important}.page a:link,.page_alink{color:#000!important;text-decoration:none}.page a:visited,.page_avisited{color:#3e3e3c!important;text-decoration:none}.page a:active,.page a:hover,.page_ahover{color:#f8f789!important;text-decoration:underline}li,p,td,th{font-size:13px!important;padding:0;margin:0}.tborder{background:#a29e9e!important;margin-bottom:30px}.tcat{background:#a29e9e!important;color:#000!important;font-size:16px!important;padding:35px;font:700 15px/16px Arial,Sans-Serif}.tcat a:link,.tcat_alink{font-size:15px;color:#000!important;text-decoration:none}.tcat a:visited,.tcat_avisited{color:#3e4512!important;text-decoration:none}.tcat a:active,.tcat a:hover,.tcat_ahover{color:#2d2d22!important;text-decoration:none}.thead{background:#9f9a9a!important;color:#000!important;font-size:13px;font-weight:700}.thead a:link,.thead_alink{color:#000!important;text-decoration:none}.thead a:visited,.thead_avisited{color:#082f13!important;text-decoration:none}.thead a:active,.thead a:hover,.thead_ahover{color:#c9e477!important;text-decoration:underline}.tfoot{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#000!important}.tfoot a:link,.tfoot_alink{color:#494345!important;text-decoration:none}.tfoot a:visited,.tfoot_avisited{color:#353936!important;text-decoration:none}.tfoot a:active,.tfoot a:hover,.tfoot_ahover{color:#e4eeb5!important;text-decoration:underline}.alt1,.alt1Active{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#000!important;font-size:16px;border-bottom:1px solid #948f8f!important}.alt2,.alt2Active{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#000!important;font-size:16px;border-bottom:10px solid #a2a2a2!important}.inlinemod{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#000!important}.wysiwyg{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#141314!important;font:400 13px verdana}.wysiwyg a:link,.wysiwyg_alink{color:#312f1e!important}.wysiwyg a:visited,.wysiwyg_avisited{color:#141314!important}.wysiwyg a:active,.wysiwyg a:hover,.wysiwyg_ahover{color:#141314!important;text-decoration:underline}.bginput,textarea{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#000!important;font-size:13px}.bginput optgroup,.bginput option{background:#9ea9b9!important;font-size:13px}select{background:#9ea9b9!important;color:#000!important;font-size:13px}optgroup,option{background:#9ea9b9!important;font-size:13px}.smallfont{color:#000!important;font-size:13px}.time{color:#2f2f2f}.navbar{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#444!important;font-size:13px;font-weight:700}.navbar a:link,.navbar a:visited,.navbar_alink,.navbar_avisited{color:#444!important;text-decoration:none}.navbar a:active,.navbar a:hover,.navbar_ahover{color:#444!important;text-decoration:underline}.highlight{color:#101a27!important;font-weight:700}.fjdpth0,.fjsel{background:#a3c1e6!important;color:#000!important}.fjdpth3{background:#9ea9b9!important;color:#000!important}.panel{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#000!important;padding:10px;border-bottom:1px solid #a2a2a2!important}.panelsurround{border-bottom:1px solid #a2a2a2!important;background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#000!important}legend{color:#000!important;font:15px tahoma,verdana,geneva,lucida,'lucida grande',arial,helvetica,sans-serif;border-bottom:1px solid #a2a2a2!important}.vbmenu_control{background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#000!important;font:700 36px tahoma,verdana,geneva,lucida,'lucida grande',arial,helvetica,sans-serif;padding:3px 6px;white-space:nowrap}.vbmenu_control a:link,.vbmenu_control a:visited,.vbmenu_control_alink,.vbmenu_control_avisited{color:#000!important;text-decoration:none}.vbmenu_control a:active,.vbmenu_control a:hover,.vbmenu_control_ahover{color:#000!important;text-decoration:underline}.vbmenu_popup{background:#9f9a9a!important;color:#000!important;border:1px solid #9f9a9a!important}.vbmenu_option{background:#adb9ca!important;color:#1a2e55!important;font:13px tahoma,verdana,geneva,lucida,'lucida grande',arial,helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:nowrap;cursor:pointer;border-top:0 solid #adb9ca!important}.vbmenu_option a:link,.vbmenu_option_alink{color:#1a2e55!important;text-decoration:none}.vbmenu_option a:visited,.vbmenu_option_avisited{color:#000!important;text-decoration:none}.vbmenu_option a:active,.vbmenu_option a:hover,.vbmenu_option_ahover{color:#e9df72!important;text-decoration:none}.vbmenu_hilite{background:#adb9ca!important;color:#000!important;font:12px tahoma,verdana,geneva,lucida,'lucida grande',arial,helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:nowrap;cursor:pointer;border-top:1px solid #adb9ca!important}.vbmenu_hilite a:active,.vbmenu_hilite a:hover,.vbmenu_hilite a:link,.vbmenu_hilite a:visited,.vbmenu_hilite_ahover,.vbmenu_hilite_alink,.vbmenu_hilite_avisited{color:#000!important;text-decoration:none}.bigusername{font-size:14pt}div.thead,td.thead,th.thead{padding:0}.pagenav{color:#000}.pagenav a:active,.pagenav a:hover,.pagenav a:link,.pagenav a:visited{color:#000;text-decoration:none}.pagenav td{padding:0}.shade,a.shade:link,a.shade:visited{color:#000;text-decoration:none}a.shade:active,a.shade:hover{color:#000;text-decoration:underline}.tcat .shade,.tfoot .shade,.thead .shade{color:#000}.fieldset{margin-bottom:6px}.fieldset,.fieldset li,.fieldset p,.fieldset td{font-size:13px}.spoiler{color:#a2a2a2!important;text-decoration:none;background-color:#a2a2a2!important}a{outline:0}.pc_customHeader{width:990px;margin:0 auto;color:#a2a2a2!important}.pc_customHeader .logo{width:226px;height:42px;background:#a2a2a2!important;display:block}.pc_customHeader .logo img{border:0}.pc_customHeader .links{height:42px;float:right;font:700 12px/42px Arial,Sans-Serif}.pc_customHeader .links a{padding:0 5px}.links a.shopLink:active,.links a.shopLink:link,.links a.shopLink:visited,.pc_customHeader .links a.shopLink:hover{color:#cda6a6}.links a.twitterLink:active,.links a.twitterLink:link,.links a.twitterLink:visited,.pc_customHeader .links a.twitterLink:hover{color:#332a2a}.pc_customHeader .links .textLinks{float:right}.pc_customHeader .featuredAuthor{color:#eccaca!important;height:140px;width:990px;position:relative}.pc_customHeader .featuredAuthor .featuredAuthorInfo{padding:2px 10px;position:absolute;bottom:0;right:0;font:700 1.1em/1.3em Arial,Sans-Serif;color:#eccaca!important;background:#722727!important}.pc_customHeader .featuredAuthor .featuredAuthorInfo .author{color:#cad1c1}.pc_customHeader .siteLinks{width:990px;margin-bottom:10px}.pc_customHeader .siteLinks a{padding-right:10px}.vb_postbit{padding:10px;background:#a2a2a2!important;color:#000!important;font:13px verdana,arial;text-decoration:none}.vb_postbit a:link{color:#182852!important;font:12px verdana,geneva,lucida,'lucida grande',arial,helvetica,sans-serif;text-decoration:none}.vb_postbit a:visited{color:#310f19!important;font:12px verdana,geneva,lucida,'lucida grande',arial,helvetica,sans-serif;text-decoration:none}.vb_postbit a:active,.vb_postbit a:hover{color:#d1e8b6!important;font:12px verdana,geneva,lucida,'lucida grande',arial,helvetica,sans-serif;text-decoration:none}.header_bg,.vb_navigation{background:#a2a2a2!important}.css_nav{color:#000!important;font:700 13px/14px Arial,Sans-Serif;text-align:center;margin:0;padding:0 10px 0 0;border:0}.css_nav a:active,.css_nav a:hover,.css_nav a:link,.css_nav a:visited{color:#000!important;font:700 13px/14px Arial,Sans-Serif;text-align:center;text-decoration:none}.css_nav a:active,.css_nav a:hover{text-decoration:underline}.postbit_box{background-color:#adb9ca!important;color:#000!important;padding:7px;width:292px}.cat_spacer{padding-bottom:5px}.spacer{padding-top:5px}.spacer_small{padding:2px 0}.announcement{background-color:#aaccf9!important;color:#ff8128!important}.deleted,.last_visit,.moderated,.poll,.sticky,.subscribed{background:#adb9ca!important;border-bottom:1px solid #4c4f52!important;font:700 14px/16px Arial,Sans-Serif;color:#323c4b!important}.forumTitle{padding-bottom:5px}.vb_menu_control{background:#adb9ca!important;color:#000!important;font:700 13px tahoma,verdana,geneva,lucida,'lucida grande',arial,helvetica,sans-serif;padding:3px 6px;white-space:nowrap}.vb_menu_control a:link,.vb_menu_control a:visited{color:#000!important;text-decoration:none}.vb_menu_control a:active,.vb_menu_control a:hover{color:#37864D!important;text-decoration:underline}.cat_bottom{display:none}.lastPostedAuthor a,.lastPostedAuthor a:hover,.lastPostedAuthor a:link,.lastPostedAuthor a:visited{color:#0f134a!important}.botBorderCell{background:#a2a2a2!important;border-bottom:1px solid #7a7272!important}.tinyFont{font:400 10px/12px arial,sans-serif}.tborder td{padding:5px}.controls{background:#a29e9e!important;margin-bottom:15px;color:#000!important}.controls td{padding:8px;margin:5px;color:#000!important;background:#a29e9e!important}.controls a:active,.controls a:hover,.controls a:link,.controls a:visited{color:#000!important}.threadHead{background:#9ea9b9!important;font:700 14px/16px Arial,Sans-Serif;color:#000!important}.threadHead td{padding:32px;margin:0;color:#000!important;background:#9ea9b9!important}.threadHead a:active,.threadHead a:hover,.threadHead a:link,.threadHead a:visited{color:#000!important}td.leftBottom{padding:0;width:80px;background:#a2a2a2!important}.leftBottom{color:#000!important;background:#a2a2a2!important}.postContent{padding:6px 6px 5px 5px;color:#000!important;background:#a2a2a2!important}.postTitle{font:700 16px/18px arial,sans-serif;color:#2e2e09!important;background:#a2a2a2!important}.postDate{font:700 13px/14px arial,sans-serif;padding:15px;color:#000!important;background:#a2a2a2!important}.authorSig{margin-top:10px;padding-top:10px;border-top:1px solid #858181!important;font:700 13px/14px arial,sans-serif;color:#393806!important;background:#a2a2a2!important}.postTime{color:#5F5F5F}.userInfo{padding:5px 5px 5px 80px;font:400 10px/12px arial,sans-serif;color:#323231!important;background:#a2a2a2!important}.loginBox{padding:5px 0 5px 5px;font:400 11px/13px Arial,Sans-Serif}.loginTable td{padding:0 5px 10px 0}.rememberBtn{padding-right:3px}.navTable td{padding:0 10px 0 0}.vb_navbar{margin-top:10px}.vb_navbar a:active,.vb_navbar a:hover,.vb_navbar a:link,.vb_navbar a:visited{color:#0d0a0a!important}.welcomeText{padding-bottom:5px}.searchForums{position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0}.searchForums .searchText{padding-bottom:4px}.blah{height:85px;padding-top:5px;position:relative}.breadcrumbs{padding:0 0 10px}.breadcrumbs .smallfont{font:400 12px/14px Arial,Sans-Serif}.breadcrumbs a:link,.breadcrumbs a:visited{color:#0d0a0a!important}.breadcrumbs li,.breadcrumbs td{color:#0d0a0a!important;font:400 12px/14px Arial,Sans-Serif}
